text: do you need glucose yes or no depends on the duration of your activity i think for relatively short duration activity you really don't need glucose i have found for me personally that any activity up to about two hours at you know pretty decent exertion i don't need glucose the mistake that a lot of people make is they err on the side of too much glucose you see people out there for a 5k fun run and they've got two you know gels that they're squirting in their mouth and they're drinking a gatorade well no that's way too much gatorade and powerade are already slightly higher than isotonic and then when you go and add two goose to it you've basically created the most hypertonic solution imaginable you don't even need those calories to run a 5k you know you should just be drinking your volume with electrolyte or frankly just water if it's a 5k right
title: Hydration for Athletes: Should you drink sports drinks with glucose? | Peter Attia, M.D. #shorts
